title: Private Patio, Hard Surface Flooring With 4.5 Inch Base Boards, Cable
posting_body: ['Viridian is your ideal Las Vegas, Nevada destination for apartment home comfort in an unbeatable location.', 'Our studio, one, two, and three-bedroom apartment homes have something for everyone.', 'Our apartment homes feature fully equipped kitchens, open layouts, balcony or patio options, wood-style flooring, and views of the Las Vegas Strip.', "You'll find that your lifestyle is comfortable in the heart of it all at Viridian.", 'Call or chat with us to schedule your tour today.', '-Dishwasher', '-Laundry Care Center', '-New Designer Interior Paint Colors', '-On-Site Maintenance', '-Hard Surface', 'Flooring With 4.5 Inch Base Boards', '-Updated Lavish Landscaping', '-High speed internet', '-Business Center', '-New Stylish and Insulating Roofing', '-Refreshed Fitness Center', '-Upgraded Swimming Pool Areas With All New Furniture and Cabanas', '-New Comfortable BBQ Pit Area', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
